text: Avenches is a Swiss municipality in the canton of Vaud, in Broye-Vully. It was created on 1 September 2006, the village of Donatyre merged into Avenches and on 1 July 2011, the former municipality of Oleyres merged into Avenches.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 == References == == Other websites == *Municipality of Avenches, official website *Photo gallery from the Roman theatre * Category:Municipalities in Broye-Vully Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Avenches
